definition: shell/conch/cowry/mother of pearl/hard outer skin/also pr. [bei4 qiao4]
erhua variant of 貝殼|贝壳[bei4 ke2]

sentences.english: Small seashells have sometimes been used as a primitive kind of money.
sentences.chinese: 小贝壳有时用作简单的钱币。

sentences.english: Wrap the ham around the scallop . Put the scallop back onto the shell.
sentences.chinese: 将火腿包在扇贝上，并放回扇贝壳中待用。

sentences.english: Smoother than shells continually polished by the sea.
sentences.chinese: 比那恒久地被海浪摸挲的贝壳还要细腻。

sentences.english: When we was walking on the beach, we saw many sea-shells.
sentences.chinese: 当我闪在海滩上散步时，我们看到我许多贝壳。

sentences.english: All Stainless Steel lid, tank, shell, wetted parts and fittings.
sentences.chinese: 全不锈钢盖，罐，贝壳，湿零件及配件。

sentences.english: The content of ent-kaurane diterpenes was highest in A. squamosa L. (hainan).
sentences.chinese: 贝壳杉烷型二萜成分以海南产圆滑番荔枝中含量最高。

sentences.english: There is a very strong emphasis on fish and shellfish.
sentences.chinese: 同时非常强调鱼和贝壳类海鲜。

sentences.english: The little girl threaded the shells together.
sentences.chinese: 那小女孩把贝壳穿起来。

sentences.english: She has jewelry made from shells and rolls of the country's traditional Kente cloth.
sentences.chinese: 她还出售用贝壳制作的珠宝和迦纳传统的彩色布料。

sentences.english: A shell similar to that of a cockle .
Tiny shells spangle the profile of a young Roman woman of the second century A. D.
sentences.chinese: 小小的贝壳装饰着一位公元二世纪的罗马妇女的侧面。

sentences.english: Wrap the ham around the scallop. Put the scallop back onto the shell.
sentences.chinese: 将火腿包在扇贝上，并放回扇贝壳中待用。

sentences.english: A larger shell can be glued to the lid for a finishing touch.
sentences.chinese: 最后可以把一个大点的贝壳粘到瓶盖上作为装饰。

sentences.english: Use only stuff you have around the house or found items like shells or old furniture.
sentences.chinese: 只用你在房子周围能找到的材料像是贝壳或者旧家具。

sentences.english: It haunts the depths of the earth and the sea. It gleams from the hues of the shell and the precious stone.
sentences.chinese: 美，出没于深海幽谷，在奇石贝壳的色彩中闪烁。

sentences.english: When the tide ebbed, they scattered to pick sea shells.
sentences.chinese: 退潮之后，他们就四处去拾贝壳。

definition: turtle/Internet slang for 海歸|海归[hai3 gui1]
